name: Christmas Mystery II
description:
You are send to the mysterious village to collect bricks that were lost in the train accident. The job that supposed to be simple turned out to be hell!

The legends about Michal were true You have to stop him and collect the bricks. Outherwise the kids will be sad They wont get their christmas present :(

Game has 4 levels of difficulty -EASY, NORMAL, HARD and CHRISTMAS MYSTERY.

You have to stop the urban legend named Michal and also fight some snowmans, snowy owls and elfs.

If you complete the hardest difficulty you are getting wonderful reward!

         Controls

 Movement   WASD

Interact&Collect   E

Jump   Space

Reload  R

Shoot Snowball  G

Shoot Rubik Cube  F

Shoot  Left Mouse Button

Aim Right Mouse Button

Crouch ctrl

Good luck
